function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The table provides summary statistics on globalisation, settlement characteristics, and population variables, which may contain data that is predictive of disease propagation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of quantile regression to analyze covid-19 transmission may oversimplify the complex nature of disease diffusion and transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on travel bans and stay-home orders as primary public health initiatives","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing disease diffusion at small scales due to reliance on mobility restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on global-scale and local-scale interactions for disease diffusion analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocation diffusion of disease via global mobility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hierarchical diffusion within countries from globalized cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interpersonal transmission as a significant factor in disease diffusion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strong effect of interpersonal globalisation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact of trade globalisation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Counterintuitive impact of globalisation in later weeks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 diffusion influenced by population and settlement characteristics, with hdi as a strong predictor.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of settlement characteristics on covid-19 diffusion, with a focus on mobility.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban primacy contributes to disease diffusion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hierarchical connectivity between settlements increases disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accessibility of smaller settlements contributes to disease diffusion","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weak positive effect of interpersonal globalisation on covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of financial globalisation on covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prominence of trade globalisation in suppressing covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 diffusion is influenced by settlement characteristics and population density, which can lead to increased spread of the virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Areal accessibility is negatively associated with covid-19 diffusion in later weeks, particularly in countries with a high number of new cases per million.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization has mixed effects on covid-19 diffusion, impacting different portions of the distribution and various types of globalization.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher hdi is associated with more confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population aged 65 and over is associated with higher case detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Globalisation, settlement characteristics, and population characteristics influence covid-19 diffusion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between population density and outbreak of infectious diffusion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of population characteristics and their impact on covid-19
